title: Creature from the Deep
summaries: The Creature from the Deep is a Hardmode enemy from the Solar Eclipse event. They attack like most other fighter-type enemies on land, but they also have the ability to swim. While they are in water, their speed and maneuverability increases dramatically. It is also capable of jumping out of the water towards the player, doing so with maneuverability similar to a Unicorn.

statistics.Damage: 60/120/180
statistics.Max Life: 400/800/1200
statistics.KB Resist: 70%/73%/76%
statistics.Banner: [img:Creature From The Deep Banner]Creature From The Deep Banner
